name: Darien Software Systems
overview:
Darien Software Systems is an Education/Research StartUp that has been developing a School/Education Management Product called “SchoolStone” that helps Schools (Management, Teachers, Students) manage their education schedule and system. SchoolStone is one of the first such products in India, and aims to penetrate and dominate the yet uncaptured School Management Product market in India.

Besides SchoolStone, Darien has been trying to revolutionize how students learn in India, by creating online learning websites such as learnbasket.com (with an YouTube channel aswell).

They have a few reputable schools testing their Product in Beta as of now, and are aiming to go fully functional soon.
